body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

install on linux-rhel7-power9le with xl//2021.12.22

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.2-5-370ea7fdce
* **Python:** 3.7.2
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-power9le


### Additional information

in /usr/WS2/gdk/myspack/build

-rw-r--r-- 1 gdk 215026 Jan 12 11:32 spack-stage-axom-0.5.0-xiy533tdxbtzdvhrs46esajy43vtxx6h/spack-build-out.txt
-rw-r--r-- 1 gdk 284335 Jan 12 11:32 spack-stage-mcapm-2.7.12-6xygmqqrzd4io5ijhxlvnnwqcypxgxoc/spack-build-out.txt
-rw-r--r-- 1 gdk  32170 Jan 12 11:28 spack-stage-physicsutils-2.4.201111-f4k72njrllpzm5uu36kg2bov43j72h5h/spack-build-out.txt
-rw-r--r-- 1 gdk   7387 Jan 12 11:28 spack-stage-sinacpp-master-moclu7l6pbaygnbhtniv4oxn4rgomify/spack-build-out.txt


### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Problems building axom-0.5.0, mcapm-2.7.12, overlink-21.1.3, physicsutils-2.4.201111, sinacpp-master
